#summary perception stack packages

= Packages =

ndt_registration - implements 3D-NDT registration point-to-distribution and distribution-to-distribution. More information on the two algorithms can be found in <a href = ""> </a> and <a href = ""> </a>. Includes headers, sample test executable and experimental node.

ndt_feature_reg - implements local visual feature registration + 3D-NDT refinement, as described in <a href = ""> </a>. Includes library, test executable and ROS node.

ndt_map - base classes for 3D-NDT model creation.

ndt_map_builder - experimental package for 3D-NDT mapping, based on 3d_ndt registration and graph slam

pointcloud_vrml - routines for processing vrml files.

= Installation Instructions =

The packages inthis stack have no external dependencies, outside of the standard ROS installation. Simply type rosmake perception_oru.
